Demo malaria datasets

demo_malaria.Rd

These datasets are simulated data representing monthly malaria cases and associated covariates in the District of Ifanadiana, Vatovavy, Madagascar. They represent 21 orgUnits and 106 months of data (October 2016 - July 2024). They are used in demos and in internal testing.

Usage

demo_malaria

Format

demo_malaria

A data frame with 2226 rows and 12 columns:

orgUnit

DHIS2 orgUnit corresponding to primary health clinics

n_case

Number of monthly malaria cases

pev

Average monthly potential evapotranspiration

rain_mm

Total monthly rainfall

temp_c

Average monthly temperature

wealth_index

Socio-economic index

elevation

Elevation

LLIN_use

Proportion of households with at least two LLINs per member

csb_type

Type of clinic: CSB1 or CSB2

time_to_district

Travel time to district capital from clinic

LLIN_wane

Number of years since LLIN distribution campaign

period

Year and month followin DHIS2 period style (YYYYMM)
